Name: Celestial Skyweaver
Story Background: The Celestial Skyweaver is a guardian spirit that weaves the threads of the heavens, guiding lost souls to their celestial resting place. Its presence brings tranquility to troubled hearts and solace to weary travelers.
Ability: Flying, Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may tap target creature an opponent controls.
Appearance Description: The Celestial Skyweaver appears as a luminous figure adorned with billowing, ethereal wings that seem to dance with the shimmering light of the stars. Its eyes radiate a gentle warmth and its serene visage encourages peace and serenity to all who behold it.
